ygData.subject: Re: Attack on the Ark
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She looked at him not sure what to make of him. His speach threw her for a loop. She looked at him, Well then if you intend to help I d probably.. She

::Spears::

She looked at him not sure what to make of him. His speach threw her 
for a loop. She looked at him,"Well then if you intend to help I'd 
probably.." She clutched at her stomach.  The hole was now pour fluid 
out and sendingher into emence pain.  Her body was slowly dying but 
she didn't want to give up the fight. "Must save the ship." She 
passed out.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Jonathan Hogan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> {Xiane}
> 
>     "I am called...Xiane, yes I think that's right. My ship crashed 
here a
> short time ago. Maximal you say, thy caste of alleigence sounds 
familiar yet
> thy symbol registers nay but a glimmer of rememberance. Hark but 
the battle
> doth seem to be going badly for yonder 'Maximals'...."
> 
>     Lifting his head his eyes glowed darkly, readying sheild and 
sword he
> stood over the fallen bot protectively and shouted into the battle 
before
> him, "Hail and well met to all within this battle. Know that Xiane 
is here
> to protect the ark from they who wouldst do harm to thine very 
ancestral
> histories!"
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <logomorph@h...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, August 15, 2000 9:48 PM
> Subject: Re: Attack on the Ark
> 
> 
> > ::Spears::
> >
> > She looked up and saw a bot standing over her. "Yes this is the 
ark."
> > She groaned as pain ran through her body.  The gash in her side 
hurt
> > like heck. Shrapnel was sticking out of her legs, side and
> > torso. "I'm....I'm on the maximal side." She groaned again.
> > "Who..Who are you?"
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Jonathan Hogan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> > > {Xiane}
> > >
> > >     Xiane was making good pace and his internal repair programs 
were
> > > seemingly on the mend, his freshly repaired scanners blared 
inside
> > his
> > > metallic skull as it picked up a heavy battle going on quite a 
few
> > clicks
> > > away.
> > >
> > >     Galloping full speed the horse bot made good progress, 
cresting
> > a large
> > > hill visual contact was made. Several bots seemed to be in 
conflict
> > > over...no it couldn't be. This couldn't be earth could it and
> > that...That
> > > could not be the ark of legend!
> > >
> > >     Transforming Xiane stood upon the hill a good distance from 
the
> > battle
> > > but began to run, he wasn't sure who was good or who was in the
> > wrong but if
> > > that was the ark it must be protected.
> > >
> > >     Tearing up the ground as he ran he drew one object then
> > another. In his
> > > right fist he clenched a bladeless hilt, with a flick of a 
button
> > his
> > > energon sword flared to life, humming warmly in his fingers. The
> > other
> > > object was much like a door sheild yet the main face of it was
> > empty until
> > > it too was turned on, an energy sheild filling the gaps to 
provide
> > > protection.
> > >
> > >     Xiane arrived just as Spears was blasted from her spot 
behind
> > the metal
> > > plate, kneeling down he examined the bot. "Hail to thee m'lady, 
it
> > seems I
> > > find myself on a battlefeild yet know not the very sides I 
face. By
> > the
> > > matrix speak what hast befallen here and speak true, is yonder 
the
> > ark...?"
> > >
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: <logomorph@h...>
> > > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > > Sent: Tuesday, August 15, 2000 8:30 PM
> > > Subject: Re: Attack on the Ark
> > >
> > >
> > > > ::Spears/Shadow Wing::
> > > >
> > > > Spears::
> > > > She shot hits the plate and it explodes, sending shrapnel 
into her
> > > > body.  She lays on the ground, motionless, leaking mech fluid,
> > > > gasping for breath.
> > > >
> > > > Shadow Wing::
> > > > She sees Dark One heading right for her.  She glided in right
> > between
> > > > the shots. They miss her by centimeters.  She flies closer and
> > uses
> > > > her talons to scratch the cockpit glass as she turns and flies
> > > > straight upwards in a right angle to Dark One.
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Lord Unitron" <KSLawdogg@c...> 
wrote:
> > > > > Dark One/Hiss:
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > He cursed as a spear dug into his left side, though, it hit 
no
> > > > vital
> > > > > parts.  Similar to what humans called a "flesh wound".  He
> > raised
> > > > his
> > > > > missile launcher firing a rocket off at Spears.  (Or the 
plate
> > > > she's
> > > > > hiding behind).
> > > > >
> > > > > ---
> > > > >
> > > > > Dark One pulled up, a shot skinning one of his back fins 
near
> > his
> > > > > engines.  He was now upside down, facing Shadow Wing.  He 
opened
> > > > fire
> > > > > with a barrage of 5 rapid laser bolts, not wanting to use 
up to
> > > > much
> > > > > energy to take out such a simple target.
> > > >
